analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ClitCrowdFunder.checkIfFundingCompleteOrExpired (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#902-936):
	External calls:
	- payOut() (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#913)
	- removeContract() (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#917-919)
	External calls sending eth:
	- payOut() (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#913)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#917-919)

Reentrancy in ClitCrowdFunder.checkIfFundingCompleteOrExpired (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#902-936):
	External calls:
	- payOut() (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#930)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#933)
ClitCrowdFunder.removeContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol) allows anyone to destruct the contract

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#169-171) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#281-319)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#397-420)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#492-506)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#511-529)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#592-597) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#330-350):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#346-347)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#348)

ClitCrowdFunder.investment (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#878-901) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-exchangeToken.generateTokens(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#891-893)

ClitCrowdFunder.payOut (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol#937-947) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-exchangeToken.generateTokens(fundRecipient,tokenCount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x2101ba900918345003585b0a17de91570609d706.sol)
